law.catch_line: Dower need not be allotted from all parcels.
law.text: Where the lands are not severally held by different devisees or purchasers, dower need not be assigned out of each separate portion, but an equitable allotment may be made in one (1) or more parcels in lieu of the whole.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2141.
